person.persName: James Lawson (Mercer County, KY, captain, Hall's Gap Battalion)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John Lawson and Mary A. Lawson. Resident of Mercer County in 1850. Student in Mercer County in 1860. Served in the Mercer County State Guard as captain from December 7, 1864, until April 2, 1865. Reported as deserted on April 2, 1865.
